name: Kalai Icons | Free Icon Library
description:
About

Kalai Icons are a set of open-source icons designed in a consistent style. These icons are created in Figma and made available to the community. There are around 460+ Icons in 39 Categories. We are planning to grow constantly and planning to create more icons. You have any icon suggestions, comment in the description. Icons are 24px size with 2px padding inside, and followed material icon guidelines for designing.


It's Free to use for personal & commercial projects. Also, have the freedom to edit or modify, or share. 


How To Use

Every icon is converted into components so you can search on the asset library for easy access. For changing the size of the icon, use the 'Scale' option (Shortcut 'K'). 


Created by

Ananthanath A X Kalaiism
